channel.title: CVE Feed for Timersys -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-24003|2023-04-06T08:09:14.646Z -- timersys -- wp%20popups%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20popup%20builder
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Timersys WP Popups – WordPress Popup plugin <= 2.1.4.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29105|2024-06-04T17:57:26.179Z -- timersys -- wp%20popups
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Timersys WP Popups allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Popups: from n/a through 2.1.5.5.
